Name: Good Girls
About the game: Relaxing puzzle game. Just relax and play. Or play for speed. Or look... :D If it's too hard you can skip the level (press F) STEAM LEADERBOARDS In the game, you can compete for the best passing of levels with other players. For this we use 'Steam Leaderboards', to see the fastest players, go to the achievements on the game page. STEAM CLOUD The file with your progress will be saved in the 'Steam Cloud' and you will never lose your progress.
